name: Fake Video Call Cat
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Cat Call.
Fake Video Call Cat
Fake Video Call Ivory - a game application where you can joke to call a cat or kitten!
Raffle loved ones, let people think that your cat is calling you!
Frightened friends and domestic animals, including cat Fake call and show a friend, or a kitten, they will be surprised! Raffle of a lot of fun! In the game you can choose different kinds of cat calls! A real blast and a voice straight out of the tube! Listen to the sound of a cute kitten!
ATTENTION! This is not a real but only an imitation of the call! The app does not bear any harm and is only for fun!
Thank you for playing with us leave us your feedback and we try to make our games even more interesting!
